article.aria-label: Instructional Minutes Letter From Dr. Edison

h3.a: Instructional Minutes Letter From Dr. Edison

div.div: The Aquilla ISD will educate each individual within his/her capabilities in a manner that will develop each person to his/her maximum potential and will thus prepare students for the successful pursuit of their life's goals.
